PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-08392017-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 8 Respecting the Use of Model Aircraft
PrecisOrder approving INTERIM ORDER NO. 8 RESPECTING FLIGHT THE USE OF MODEL AIRCRAFT, made by the Minister of Transport on June 16, 2017, in order to reduce the growing risks to aviation safety and the safety of the public by operators of model aircraft who, given the absence of appropriate regulations, are at the highest risk of causing an incident or accident.
AttachmentsAttachment
